properties.version.name: name

resource.process: {{ assert ( files.size() == 3 ) && files.every{ it.lastModified() == new File( mainPom ).lastModified() }}}
{{ assert ( files.size() == 3 ) && files.every{ it.lastModified() == new File( mainPom ).lastModified() }}}
{{ assert ( files.size() == 3 ) && files.every{ it.lastModified() == new File( mainPom ).lastModified() }}}
{{ assert ( files.size() == 3 ) && files.every{ it.lastModified() > new File( mainPom ).lastModified() }}}
{{ assert file.file && file.renameTo( new File( file.parentFile, '1-pom-1.xml' )) }}
{{ assert file.file && file.renameTo( new File( file.parentFile, "2-$file.name" )) }}

configuration.assertGroovy: new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-541/1' ).directory ! new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-541/2' ).directory new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-541/3' ).directory new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-541/1' ).directorySize() == 0 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-541/1' ).recurse([:], {}).size == 115 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-541/3' ).directorySize() == 274188 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-541/3' ).recurse([:], {}).size == 117

new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-509/1' ).listFiles().size() == ${springCompileTestDependencies} new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-509/2' ).listFiles().size() == 6 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-509/2' ).directorySize() == 2431079 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-509/3' ).listFiles().size() == 3 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-509/3' ).directorySize() == 250164 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-509/4' ).listFiles().size() == 29 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-509/4' ).directorySize().with{ ( delegate == 5623107 ) || ( delegate == 5623145 ) } new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-509/5' ).listFiles().size() == 11 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-509/5' ).directorySize() == 10024502 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-509/6' ).listFiles().size() == 6 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-509/6' ).directorySize() == 9827762 ! new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-509/7' ).directory

new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-506/1' ).directorySize() == 177748 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-506/2' ).directorySize() == 177748 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-506/3' ).directorySize() == 177748 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-506/4' ).directorySize() == 177748 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-506/5' ).directorySize() == 247326 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-506/6' ).directorySize() == 247326 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-506/7' ).directorySize() == 247326

new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-515/1/1.bat' ).text.contains( '@echo off' ) ! new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-515/1/1.bat' ).text.contains( '$' + '{' )
! new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-515/2/1.bat' ).text.contains( '$' + '{' ) new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-515/2/1.bat' ).text.contains( '[${project.groupId}:${project.artifactId}:${project.version}]' ) new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-515/2/1.bat' ).text.contains( '[' + project.groupId + ':' + project.artifactId + ':' + project.version + ']' )
new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-515/3/1.bat' ).text.contains( '$' + '{' ) new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-515/4/1.BaT' ).text.contains( '$' + '{' )
! new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-515/5/opa-1-apo.bAt' ).text.contains( '$' + '{' ) new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-515/5/opa-1-apo.bAt' ).text.contains( '[${project.groupId}:${project.artifactId}:${project.version}]' ) new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-515/5/opa-1-apo.bAt' ).text.contains( '[' + project.groupId + ':' + project.artifactId + ':' + project.version + ']' )

new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-522/2' ).listFiles().size() == 2 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-522/2' ).recurse([ type: groovy.io.FileType.FILES ], { assert it.file }).size() == 2 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-522/3' ).recurse([ type: groovy.io.FileType.FILES ], { assert it.file }).size() == 16 new File( outputDirectory, 'pl-522/3' ).recurse([ type: groovy.io.FileType.FILES, returnList: false ], { assert it.file }).size() == 0
